page.title: 13Today's News 2
page.content: {Cylinder Stolen}A propane gas cylinder worth Â£55 and weighing about 1.5cwt. has been stolen from a field between Old Malton and Pickering. {Life-Line for College}North Riding College of Education,at Scarborough, may have to close down for economic reasons.(We get students from this college twice a year at school.) {Beck Isle Museum}Beck Isle Museum of rural life,Pickering,will be open daily10.30a.m.to12.30p.m. and then 2.00p.m.to 5.00p.m. during August. 60p adults.30p children. {Patronal Festival}Pickering parish church kept its patronal festival of St.Peter&St.Paul on Sunday,when the scouts,cubs,guides and brownies and the Sunday School,attended family communion celebrated by the vicar,Canon Geoffrey Lawn.One hundred and thirty people received communion.
